title: Graduate Student Interview
Interview Descriptions: First, fill the form about myself, them go in and intro myself to them, then they also will do intro themselves. Next asking question about internship did i request another company and the company backgorund. Last, let me ask them what i want to know.

title: Lab Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SEGi University in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Very casual interview.  The interviewer is very nice. For this position, only the HR and School Lead will conduct the interviewer. Done online, you will get an email offering for an interview and you can set the date and time as you see fit.
Interview Questions: What do you know about lab safety?

title: Marketing Head Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SEGi University (Perai) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions:
It was a horrible interview experience. There was a lady who were shouting non stop during an online interview. She shouts to ask question basically. Felt kinda racist too. Also, felt so obvious that she was like showing her hands pointing to me and saying she is not a good fit and stuff. 

It doesn't matter someone is fit or not fit for the position they've applied for. The interviewer should be professional handling the interview. I totally lose interest in answering any questions after all the shouting and stuff. I am surprise well known university like Segi has people like that. Imagine students who are studying there. How would they be treated?
Interview Questions: Q1: Tell me about yourself (interrupt a few times before you were about answer anything)

title: Senior Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at SEGi University (Kuala Lumpur) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Interviewed by the HOD and Deputy HOD. The process was typical interview, 1. Introduce yourself followed by QnA; 2. Presentation; and 3. Negotiation with HR. 

1 and 2 went well, for nearly 1 hour. 
HR was offering a salary apt for school teacher not for a lecturer.
Interview Questions:
1. Introduce yourself.
2. What did you learn most during your study?
3. How can you contribute to the department?

title: Administrative Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SEGi University
Interview Descriptions: I applied for sales & marketing, but they offered me another saying this is the only position they have. But in just 2 weeks time, my friend got the position for sales. During the interview, they did not provide clear expectation of what my role is, and we proceed with test consist of 3 short essay and 1 letter.
Interview Questions: What do you want to learn

title: Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at SEGi University (Kuala Lumpur)
Interview Descriptions: The Interview Process is simple and straightforward. The question asked was based on your resume and position applied. Panel go through the resume and asked based on experience and information given to them. The question was difficult but more importantly it is relating to the job scope and personality.
Interview Questions: What can you contribute to the University

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at SEGi University in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the position through Job street. after couple of weeks i was called for an interview. normally there will 2 sessions for the interview but since the Head join the interview was cut into 1
Interview Questions: What is your career plan in 5 years time

title: Senior Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 8 weeks. I interviewed at SEGi University (Petaling Jaya) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: Smooth and rapid interview process, taking less than 2 months from the time of application. I was asked to give a mock lecture and describe my past working experience in the presence of the Dean and a few faculty members.
Interview Questions: Why have you decided to join the University? How would you contribute to the university if you get selected?

title: Faculty Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SEGi University (Kuala Lumpur)
Interview Descriptions: HR dept have 2 interview process. They shortlist and called in for first round interview. The recruiter was very polite and pprofesional in her approach. They ask relevant questions pertaing to role applied for. The overall session was average.
Interview Questions: How long were you serving in the education industry ?

title: Copywriter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at SEGi University (Kuala Lumpur) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: Pretty straight forward with some tests I have to sit for. Interviewers were professional and accommodating. The questions asked were relevant to what i've applied for and their feedback towards my answers were positive and persuasive.

title: Head of Department Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3+ months. I interviewed at SEGi University (Kuala Lumpur) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Headhunter company called to arrange interview. First interview with immediate superior was short but pleasant. Managed to 'sell' the reasons why my boss should hire me. Thereafter the HR department was very efficient in following up on the job offer.
Interview Questions: How are you able to use your experience, skills and knowledge to bring your department to the next level?
